summary: Diff evidence confirms REQ-5 (LandModel baseEmissive=2.2 when emissiveMap exists) and partially confirms REQ-3 (KeyLightSync intensity updated). The diff does not provide evidence for the required Canvas-level `dithering: true`, toneMappingExposure change, hemisphereLight intensity change, or UnrealBloomPass threshold/luminanceSmoothing updates. Additionally, LandModel introduces material-level dithering, which was not requested and violates the stated constraint to only change the baseEmissive numeric value in that file.

missing_requirements.requirement: In `frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx`, update the `<Canvas gl={{ ... }} />` configuration to include `dithering: true` inside the existing `gl` object, without changing any other `gl` properties or the surrounding JSX structure.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided truncated `CubeVisualization.tsx` diff does not show the `<Canvas gl={{...}} />` block and contains no evidence that `dithering: true` was added to the renderer `gl` object.

missing_requirements.requirement: In `frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx` within `onCreated`, set `gl.toneMappingExposure = 0.85;` and do not change any other `onCreated` logic or assignments.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated diff excerpt for `CubeVisualization.tsx` does not include the `onCreated` handler, so there is no direct evidence the assignment was made.

missing_requirements.requirement: In `frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx`, set the scene `hemisphereLight` `intensity={1.2}` without changing any other lighting properties or structure.
missing_requirements.reason: While `KeyLightSync` intensity is shown as updated, the truncated diff does not include any `hemisphereLight` JSX, so the hemisphere intensity change cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: In `frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx`, update UnrealBloomPass calibration values: `threshold` to `1.5` and `luminanceSmoothing` (when supported) to `0.1`, without changing pipeline logic/structure.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated diff does not show the UnrealBloomPass instantiation or any `threshold`/`luminanceSmoothing` assignments, so the numeric updates cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the final build artifact includes all calibration changes (REQ-1 through REQ-5) without reverts removing `dithering: true` from the Canvas `gl` block in `CubeVisualization.tsx`.
missing_requirements.reason: Because the diff excerpt does not show the Canvas `gl` block and there is no evidence `dithering: true` was added there, this cannot be considered satisfied.

hallucinated_features.description: Enabled material-level dithering for all land meshes (`m.dithering = true`) in `LandModel.tsx`.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only allowed changing `m.userData.baseEmissive` from 2.0 to 2.2 inside the existing `if (obj.material.emissiveMap)` block and explicitly said not to change other logic in `LandModel.tsx`. Adding/setting `m.dithering` is an additional renderer/material behavior change not requested.
evidence: frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx (truncated): "// Enable dithering for all land meshes" and "m.dithering = true;"
